attributes.action: Reverse planning decision to allow a Tesco store to be built in Greenfield, Saddleworth
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tesco have been granted planning permission to build a store in Greenfield, Saddleworth.
This store will seriously undermine local businesses, and may lead to their closure. The loss off these businesses will detract from the character of the Saddleworth villages. Furthermore, this development is not supported by local residents. There are already 5 tesco stores within 8 miles of Greenfield. We do not need another, and the increased traffic it will bring. We call on the government to have this decision reversed.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Reverse planning decision to allow a Tesco store to be built in Greenfield, Saddleworth."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20116


Prime Minister's Office
